items.sentence: If I\'d taken time to brush my teeth after breakfast, I would\'ve missed my bus.
You should spend less time complaining and more time doing something productive.
Tom clicked on the thumbnail so he could see a larger version of the same image.
Tom was already drinking his third beer before Mary had even finished her first.
Tom doesn\'t let his children watch TV until after they\'ve done their homework.
You\'re speaking a little too fast for me. Would you speak a little more slowly?
All Tom wanted was to find a woman who would accept all the love he had to give.
Tom didn\'t like living in the city and moved back to the farm where he grew up.
Tom realized that he hadn\'t paid the bill, so he went back into the restaurant.
At first, I thought Tom was angry, but then I realized that he was just worried.
